page.title: 11OAKENCLOUGH:ATTITUDES
page.content: Most of the people interviewed in our survey are very content with the area as it is at present.When asked what quality or feature of life appealed to them several phrases constantly recurred:"unspoilt countryside" "peace and serenity".Most of the residents considered that the area would remain largely unchanged and with the existing pattern of landowning agencies this would appear to be likely.During the course of our survey we asked a leading question:"What do you think the people of the future would find most attractive about the Oakenclough area?" Most of the replies to the question reflected the belief that future people will be in greater need of the peace and serenity of the area than themselves.One or two young persons brought up in this locality said they would not wish to live anywhere else.
